org.apache.jackrabbit.core.nodetype
Interface NodeTypeRegistryListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
IndexingConfigurationImpl, NodeTypeManagerImpl, PropertyTypeRegistry, VirtualNodeTypeStateManager
public interface NodeTypeRegistryListener

The NodeTypeRegistryListener interface allows an implementing object to be informed about node type (un)registration.

See Also:
NodeTypeRegistry.addListener(NodeTypeRegistryListener), NodeTypeRegistry.removeListener(NodeTypeRegistryListener)

Method Summary
 void nodeTypeRegistered(Name ntName)
          Called when a node type has been registered.
 void nodeTypeReRegistered(Name ntName)
          Called when a node type has been re-registered.
 void nodeTypesUnregistered(Collection<Name> names)
          Called when a set of node types has been unregistered.
 

Method Detail

nodeTypeRegistered

Called when a node type has been registered.

Parameters:

nodeTypeReRegistered

void nodeTypeReRegistered(Name ntName)
Called when a node type has been re-registered.

Parameters:
ntName - name of the node type that has been registered

nodeTypesUnregistered

void nodeTypesUnregistered(Collection<Name> names)
Called when a set of node types has been unregistered.

Parameters:
names - names of the types that have been unregistered
